# Intro to dataset

In this report, we analyze the India TB Pathways dataset.

```{python}
# Import packages
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from itables import show

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv("data/india_tb_pathways_and_costs_data.csv")

show(df.head())
```
